column5: Meets at least 3 of the 5 following criteria?
Date Status Justification record as created
International Normalized Ratio (how fast the patients blood clots relative to the control)(used for MELD)
Malnutrition defined as loss of 1 standard deviation of expected growth ?
Ornithine Transcarbamylase Deficiency (OTC) or Crigler-Najjar Disease Type I?
For primary biliary cirrhosis, primary Sclerosing cholangitis, or other Cholestatic liver diseases: Bilirubin (mg/dl)* - Value
For primary biliary cirrhosis, primary Sclerosing cholangitis, or other Cholestatic liver diseases: Bilirubin (mg/dl)* - Date
Prothrombin time (secs. Prolonged) over control - Value
Prothrombin time (secs. Prolonged) over control - Date
Refractory Ascites/Hepato-Hydrothorax - unresponsive to diuretic and salt restriction therapy leading to respiratory distress or requiring supplemental tube feeding
Recurrent cholangitis defined as 2 or more episodes in 6 months requiring hospitalization and intravenous antibiotics?
Spontaneous bacterial peritonitis - a gram stain of ascitic fluid positive for the presence of bacteria
Spontaneous bacterial peritonitis - a positive culture of ascitic fluid for bacteria
Spontaneous bacterial peritonitis - an ascitic fluid white blood cell count with greater than 300 polymorphonuclear cells per milliliter, or a total of 500 white blood cells per milliliter
Candidate Status Code for Justification form
Documented unresponsive active variceal hemorrhage or gastro-intestinal bleeding requiring transfusion of at least 10 cc/kg of red blood cells?
Patient Identifier - from WL for A & R Cands,TCR for L Cands
